name: Daedalus Ultra
description:
Welcome to Daedalus Ultra. You have been trapped in a tower of labyrinths with the dangerous Minotaur, find the keys to move on to the next levels to get to the roof, but make sure you collect the feathers scattered throughout the mazes, you'll need them for your daring escape. 

Programmed by Steven Gonzalez

Art by Garrett Canepa
